title: Asset Investment Planning
description: An asset strategist needs to decide which aging substation transformers to replace next year based on health and criticality.

tasks.description: Gather data on all transformers older than 30 years, including their health index (from DGA, etc.) and load history.
tasks.expected_outcome: System compiles a list of aging transformers with their condition data.

tasks.description: Determine the criticality of each transformer based on the number of customers and type of load (e.g., hospitals, industrial) it serves.
tasks.expected_outcome: System assigns a criticality score to each transformer.

tasks.description: Create a prioritized replacement list based on a combined risk score of poor health and high criticality.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a ranked list of transformers recommended for replacement.
